formattedAddress: 214 W 39th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 214 W 39th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text:
I ordered a dress in February of 2020 right before everything shut down in March,  from a boutique that sells Tarik Ediz. My dress came in the end of April. I wore the dress in August for a party. While I was wearing the dress the beading on the arms fell apart. It wasn‚Äôt made with highest quality for the amount they charge. The dress was 1100. It shouldn‚Äôt have fallen apart. I contacted the designer. I contacted Marc and he told me to contact the boutique. I spoke with the boutique and they told me they contacted Marc and are waiting for his response. Marc never got back to them. I contacted Marc again and again and he never responded back to me. The boutique then said
Marc told them the dress was ordered in February. I said that is true but the dress didn‚Äôt come until April and we were in the middle of a pandemic. Where was I going with a dress like that? The dress was worn in August one time and it fell apart. I took pictures at the party with the dress on to show him what happened. He completely ignored me. The least he could have done was repair the dress. I would never order a dress from them again. There are other designers just as nice that won‚Äôt fall apart.

I ordered a dress in February of 2020 right before everything shut down in March,  from a boutique that sells Tarik Ediz. My dress came in the end of April. I wore the dress in August for a party. While I was wearing the dress the beading on the arms fell apart. It wasn‚Äôt made with highest quality for the amount they charge. The dress was 1100. It shouldn‚Äôt have fallen apart. I contacted the designer. I contacted Marc and he told me to contact the boutique. I spoke with the boutique and they told me they contacted Marc and are waiting for his response. Marc never got back to them. I contacted Marc again and again and he never responded back to me. The boutique then said
Marc told them the dress was ordered in February. I said that is true but the dress didn‚Äôt come until April and we were in the middle of a pandemic. Where was I going with a dress like that? The dress was worn in August one time and it fell apart. I took pictures at the party with the dress on to show him what happened. He completely ignored me. The least he could have done was repair the dress. I would never order a dress from them again. There are other designers just as nice that won‚Äôt fall apart.

originalText.text: I‚Äôm a bride to be I bought a Tarik Ediz dress that I saw in line from dress me up in NYC on 35th between 6 & 7 Ave. once I received the dress the quality of the dress was terrible!!!!! It look like a dress that cost $50  The quality of the dress was totally different from the pictures on the website the Breast cup were on even they looked like sponge and it was showing under the sheer fabric  there was no under wire for support. I was so stressed so unhappy When i called the Tarik Ediz show room the guy Danny store spoke with Mark from the show room he asked for pictures of the dress and we sent it over.  They received  the email. They were so rude to us and hung up the phone because of how bad we were telling them that they dress was. Be very careful when ordering things online. These people will say anything photoshop and do what ever they have to do to get your money. So no I will not recommend this designer at all!!!üëéüèº
